name: wbr
summary: The `<wbr>` HTML element represents a word break opportunityâ€”a position within text where the browser may optionally break a line, though its line-breaking rules would not otherwise create a break at that location.
tagOmission: It is an empty element; it must have a start tag, but must not have an end tag.
permittedParents: Any element that accepts phrasing content.
